name: NetDetective
description: NetDetective is an easy-to-use API that provides information about an IP address, including, but not limited to, whether it's known for spam, brute-force attacks, bot-nets, VPN endpoints, data center endpoints, and more. With DetectiveIP, you can quickly and easily gather information about any IP address to help filter requests and avoid potential attacks.

api_methods.name: /query
api_methods.description: Query information about an IP address.

parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.description:
The IP address to use for the query.
Defaults to the ip address of the connecting client

utterances.utterance: Can you check the details for IP address 192.168.1.1?
I need information on the IP 203.0.113.5.
What can you tell me about the IP address 172.16.254.1?
Please provide details for the IP 10.0.0.2.
Is there any information available for IP address 198.51.100.10?
Can you find out if IP 192.0.2.44 is associated with any threats?
I'd like to know more about the IP 203.0.113.25.
Could you check if IP address 198.51.100.20 is known for spam?
What information do you have on IP 172.16.0.5?
Please look up the IP address 10.0.0.15 for any suspicious activity.

api_methods.name: /query
api_methods.description: Query information about an IP address.

parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.description:
The IP address to use for the query.
Defaults to the ip address of the connecting client

utterances.utterance: Can you check if the IP address 192.168.1.1 is associated with any malicious activity?
I need to know if the IP 203.0.113.5 is a VPN endpoint.
Is there any information on the IP address 172.16.254.1 regarding spam activities?
Please provide details about the IP 198.51.100.10 and its history of brute-force attacks.
Can you tell me if the IP 10.0.0.5 is part of a bot-net?
I want to verify if the IP address 192.0.2.25 is linked to any data center.
Check the IP 203.0.113.45 for any known security threats.
Is the IP 198.51.100.20 flagged for any suspicious activities?
Can you find out if the IP 172.16.0.2 is used for spam?
I need a report on the IP address 10.0.0.10 to see if it's a VPN endpoint.
